attributes.action: Prevent Paedophiles From Working With Children By Implementing A 4-Tier Lie Detection Test In Place Of Existing Police Checks Which Only Uncover Known Sex Offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Existing police background checks can only bring to light previously known sex offenders.

Applicants for jobs working with children (and other vulnerable groups) should undergo a 4-tier test to include - Polygraph, Voice Stress Analysis, Sodium Pentathol and close Scrutiny by experts with the same level of Lie Detecting skill as Derren Brown -  Applicants that don't pass the tests with flying colours should then be rejected without compromise.

This would almost certainly deter ALL applications from people with unsavoury intentions who would otherwise pass existing police checks undetected.
